entry.value: import pandas as pd%%00010import numpy as np%%00010%%00010df=input_table%%00010#heat efficiencies %%00010#rema%%00010eff_heat=0.7%%00010#new direct share%%00010eff_new_gas=eff_nheat_gas*1/(1-eff_nelc_gas)%%00010eff_new_coal=eff_nheat*1/(1-eff_nelc_coal)%%00010%%00010# calculating the base for CHP nat gas production emission%%00010# for
